channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: PA Elections Chief Asks Court To Force Counties To Use Unverified Voter Registrations

item.title: Dems Rebelling Against Trump Resurrect Confederate Talking Points
item.description: Democrats are using arguments for states' rights as a cynical ploy to paint themselves as victims of an oppressive federal government.

item.title: Lawsuit: Louisiana Demands FDA End Biden’s ‘Illegal’ Mail-Order Abortion Pill Permissions
item.description: The filing is careful to note that many Louisiana women have suffered loss and injury from mail-order mifepristone.

item.title: We’re a Long Way from October 6
item.description: Israel is now the military hegemon in the region, and Hamas is a shadow of its former self.

item.title: To Fix the Deficit, Start with Bloated ‘Disability’ Programs
item.description: Cutting spending is always hard, so conservatives should focus on the least deserving recipients no matter what walk of life they are in.

item.title: Trump Should Use His Tariff Instincts to Lower Drug Prices
item.description: The president has an opportunity to pressure foreign leaders into delivering a fair prescription drug market for Americans.

item.title: Ag Secretary Rollins says farmer aid package will land once government reopens
item.description: The Trump administration pledged to send relief to farmers who are struggling with low crop prices and high costs once the government shutdown ends.

item.title: Colorado Is Still as Confused on Free Speech as It Is on Gender
item.description: The Supreme Court appears skeptical of laws restricting therapists from counseling against gender transitions.
